title: In the foot steps of St Paul.
text:
Great driver, great tour. Just right for an 80 year old, accompanied by daughter.
The highlight was the museum. Wonderful entrance, glass floor over ancient diggings,
Great collection, and on the upper floor, a beautiful view of the Acropolis.
Our driver was very good, and showed us the best of Athens within the timeframe we had, including where St Paul preached his sermons.
Would recommend this company highly to tourists visiting Athens on a cruise, in particular.

title: Acropolis Museum.
text: Wonderful, what more could be said. Allow a couple of hours. Great entrance over ancient diggings. Not to be missed.

title: Parthenon.
text: Only viewed from afar. Very impressive even from a distance. While not every one can climb up to top to see this, make sure you see it while in Athens.

title: Acropolis.
text: Only seen from afar, due to my age, (80), but wonderful from anywhere, especially from the upper floor of the nearby museum.
